bibl.title: Telegram from Pedro Nogueira to Philip Showalter Hench, November 26, 1952

div1.p: Hench receives permission to lay a wreath beneath Finlay's medallion as a representative of the Mayo Foundation.

div1.head: Telegram from Pedro Nogueira to Philip Showalter Hench, November 26, 1952
div1.opener:
CLASS OF SERVICE
----
This is a full-rate
Telegram or Cable-
gram unless its de-
ferred character is in-
dicated by a suitable
symbol above of pre-
ceding the address.
WESTERN
UNION
W. P. MARSHALL, PRESIDENT
1201
(04)=..
__________________________________________________
The filing time above on telegrams and day letters is STANDARD TIME at point of origin. Time of receipt is STANDARD TIME at point of destination
MA497
M.CDU326 14 PD INTL FR=CD HABANA VIA RCA 26 1734=
1952 NOV 26 PM 5 26
DR PHILIP HENCH= MAYO CLINIC ROCHESTER (MINN)=
div1.p:
PLACEMENT OF WREATHS APPROVED AS YOU WANTED=
PEDRO=
THE COMPANY WILL APPRECIATE SUGGESTIONS FROM ITS PATRONS CONCERNING ITS SERVICE
